venue.name: New Britain Museum Of American Art

item.description:
Yes, we have another meetup scheduled for this evening, but play it right and you can do both......

Dinner and a Movie, Thursday 29th...4pm. The Fantasic World of M.C. Escher (50min.)
Movie Free with General Museum Admission ($9 or less).
5pm dinner at Cafe on the Park. Call for Special Dinner Menu or reservations 860-229-0257 x 240.
The basic cafe menu is online at
http://www.nbmaa.org/...


I asked, and they will re-run the movie at 7:00pm! So if 4:00pm is too early, catch the second showing. the museum is open until 8:00pm on Thursdays. If you see the early movie, you have plenty of time to go through the exhibit or see some of the other exhibits at the museum.
item.how_to_find_us: I will probably be at the 7:00pm showing - short brunette, with knitting.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: The Fantasic World of M.C. Escher @ New Britain Museum of American Art
